xMatixPlatform.title: Warranty-to-Recovery Execution
xMatixPlatform.headingColored1: from first claim to final settlement
xMatixPlatform.description1: Warranty execution often breaks across service, claims, inventory, and finance systems. Claims are reviewed manually, recoveries are delayed, and leakage goes unnoticed. xMatix enables end-to-end warranty-to-recovery execution on a single operational foundation, connecting claims intake, validation, fulfilment, and recovery with shared data, rules, and intelligence.

ecosystemSection.title: The Problem
ecosystemSection.description: Most organisations manage warranties using disconnected systems and spreadsheets. While individual teams handle claims, repairs, and settlements, no system owns the full warranty lifecycle, resulting in revenue leakage, slow recoveries, and poor visibility.

ecosystem.title: Warranty & Claims Systems
ecosystem.description: Capture claims and approvals but rely heavily on manual review, lacking real-time service, parts, and cost context.

ecosystem.title: Service & Operations
ecosystem.description: Execute repairs and replacements without tight integration to claim validation, entitlement rules, or recovery workflows.

ecosystem.title: Inventory & Logistics
ecosystem.description: Manage parts movement and returns separately, creating delays and mismatches between claims, fulfilment, and recovery actions.

ecosystem.title: Finance & Analytics Tools
ecosystem.description: Track warranty costs and recoveries after the fact, without the ability to intervene during active warranty execution.

whatIsIt.title: How xMatix Helps
whatIsIt.description2: xMatix acts as the execution layer for warranty operations, unifying claims intake, service fulfilment, inventory movement, and financial recovery into a single continuous workflow. Built on the xMatix Platform, Data Fabric, and Sense, it ensures that warranty execution is policy-driven, auditable, and optimised for faster and more accurate recoveries.

cardLayoutData.title: How {{highlight}}warranty-to-recovery{{/highlight}} works on xMatix
cardLayoutData.description: Every step of the warranty lifecycle runs on a shared execution layer, enabling tighter control, faster decisions, and complete visibility from claim submission to final recovery.

features.title: Claim Intake & Validation
features.description: Capture warranty claims and automatically validate eligibility, entitlements, and coverage using shared asset, service, and policy data.

features.title: Approval & Authorisation
features.description: Apply rule-based approvals and escalation paths to ensure only valid claims progress, reducing manual review and leakage.

features.title: Repair, Replace, or Credit
features.description: Coordinate service actions, parts issuance, and logistics while tracking actual costs against warranty entitlements in real time.

features.title: Recovery & Settlement
features.description: Automate recovery from suppliers, partners, or insurers, reconcile financials, and close claims with full auditability and traceability.

requestADemo.heading: See warranty-to-recovery executed on xMatix
requestADemo.description: Request a demo to see how xMatix connects warranty claims, service execution, and financial recovery into a single, outcome-driven workflow.
